title: Supernumerario Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Quest (Cali, Valle del Cauca)
Interview Descriptions: Fue fácil, no requirió ningún tipo de experiencia laboral y en tres días obtuve el cargo, fue en la temporada decembrina y el local al que llegué fue Q28, ubicado en la 13 con 8
Interview Questions: Cuál es tu propósito en la compañía?

title: Life Skills Trainer Interview
Interview Descriptions: 1 interview. Lasted roughly 30 minutes. Interview questions were Straight to the point. Director explained position and gave me a tour of the facility. I was able to meet some clients and staff.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here

title: Activities Staff Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Quest in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: I applied online via Indeed. Had an initial phone interview with a recruiter, and then a virtual interview with the Independent Living Director the following week. Most communications were with the recruiter via email.

title: Phlebotomist Interview
Interview Descriptions: In office interview.  Asked about experience, which needles I've used, and if I have experience with pediatric patients. Asked how I would handle difficult patients.  Then did a mock blood draw.

title: Software Engineer Interview
Interview Descriptions:
Questions were asked about introduce yourself 
Why quest, what are your weakness and how did you came through it ,good thing about you
What you did in lockdown other than academics

title: Software Engineer Trainee Interview
Application Type: The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Quest in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions:
3 rounds 
Aptitude, technical interview, HR interview this are rounds conducted by company. Study basic concept and about your project it will help to crack the interview.May be there will be group discussion round.
Interview Questions: Project, basic from languages like c, java

title: General Operative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Quest (Ipswich, England) in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions: Via video link. Clear and consise, helpful . Agency on site for any queries, Particularly with I’d and pay. Uniform and footwear provided. Choice of shift pattern helpful. Agency rep on site for induction and throughout.
Interview Questions: Have you worked in this environment before ?

title: Customer Response Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Quest (San Diego, CA) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: Process went well. Questions were common sense and easy to answer. Interviewer was very friendly and made you feel comfortable.they walked me through the office and explained the position and I was able to speak to other reps about the job.

title: Software Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Quest in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: two rounds technical and HR, basic question, no need to worry, just chill and relax you will get through it. Also they will check basic of your coding understanding.so just prepare well and you will get through.
Interview Questions:
what language do you know
what is pandas
what is bumpy

title: DSP Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Quest (Tampa, FL) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Did an initial interview, then a second interview with the hiring manager. Did a background check, personality assessment, then a drug test, and then was called in to hand-sign some papers, then needed to get my fingerprints done. Confirmation of references. Then I got the call to come in for my first day of training. From start to finish, the process took several weeks?
Interview Questions: How would you interact with someone who was non-verbal?

title: KYC Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Quest (Johannesburg)
Interview Descriptions: Quick and eas hiring and interview process which involves alot of screening and tests to determine IQ an d intellect, the staff was super professional and easy going , it felt more like a meet and greet.
Interview Questions: What can you contribute to our company

title: Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Quest (New York, NY) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: very simple and straight forward. was asked simple questions about who i am and my background. Also asked about my favorite hobbies and my education and my favorite cartoons and what meals i eat

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Quest (Tampa, FL) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: The process was very simple and to the point. I did an application and was called back about a week later. There is a phone interview, in person interview, and group interview. You have to be drug tested and fingerprinted.
Interview Questions: How do you feel about working with developmentally disabled adults.

title: Hospital Account Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Quest (Philadelphia, PA) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: I met the hiring manager after applying and following up for months.  There was a hiring freeze so i called and called, emailed and called some more.  The manager took me for a tour of the lab.  It was very casual since we had had multiple discussions leading up the the actual face to face interview and I was simply waiting for the hiring freeze to be lifted
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here

title: Personal Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Quest (Romeo, MI) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: Very brief, barely got to know me before they hired me in. This is an awful place to work for however. They do not care about employees OR cleints. Bare minimum pay, no room for growth, abuse and neglect toward clientell, and you will be punished for doing what is right for the clients

title: Program Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Quest in Apr 2013
Interview Descriptions: Online application, skills test and then one on one interview then the application is passed on to the hiring manager of the group home. The hiring manager will call applicant and do the interview, then the manager will decide if they will hire the applicant.
Interview Questions: The interview questions were not hard because I've been in the field for 10+ years.
